participant_1.background:
I try to limit how much meat i eat for health reasons.
I have many homes.
I ride horses.
I like to ride motorcycles.
I collect vintage cars.

participant_2.background:
I love to ride my bike on the weekend.
I post on reduit often.
My favorite color is blue.
I am an insurance salesman.
I live alone in my condo.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. I see you like to ride your bike on the weekend. Do you do any other outdoor activities?
I also like to go camping, fishing, and hiking.
Those all sound like fun activities. I like to ride horses and collect vintage cars.
That's cool. I've never ridden a horse before, but I'd like to try it someday. Vintage cars are really cool too.
Thanks! I've been riding horses since I was a kid. It's a lot of fun and a great way to get exercise.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's a lot of work too, but it's definitely worth it.
Yeah, it can be hard work, but it's also very rewarding.
I can see how it would be.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an insurance salesman.
Oh, that's cool. I've never known anyone who was an insurance salesman before.
It's a good job. I get to help people protect their assets and their families.
That sounds like a rewarding job.
It is. I like helping people.
That's great. It sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies and a good job.
Thanks! I try to keep busy.
Me too. I like to stay active and meet new people.
That's a good way to live.
